backend/main.mo: Motoko backend handling orders with create, get, list, and admin‑protected status updates using AccessControl.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind‑based styling defining color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML page mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps admin pages with AdminRouteGuard for access control.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Gatekeeper component requiring Internet Identity login and admin status before rendering admin pages.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Bitcoin: UI component showing BTC payment details, copy‑to‑clipboard actions, and order metadata.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with header, navigation, admin link logic, and footer structure.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Denom: Displays a callout card showing the available USDT denomination range.
Provides a dropdown selector for choosing predefined USDT card denominations.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Quant: Renders a quantity input with increment/decrement controls and validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context providing login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating orders and checking admin status through the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider setup.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Admin view for inspecting a single order and updating its status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin list of all orders with status badges and navigation to order detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Renders the gift card catalog page with denomination/quantity selection and checkout navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout form, creates discounted BTC-based orders, shows errors, and displays success with payment instructions.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders marketing homepage with hero section, features, and navigation to the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/OrderStatusPage.tsx: Fetches and displays order status, payment details, and error states based on an order ID.
frontend/src/state/cartSession.ts: Manages saving, loading, and clearing cart data from sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme colors, fonts, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, features, known issues, and architectural notes for the gift card storefront.
